name: Awesomic
headline: Get matched with top 1% of talents in 24h
description:
Awesomic matches companies with top & vetted product talents in 24 hours. Find your designers, engineers or no-coders in a few clicks. They deliver you results through our app, every 24 business hours guaranteed, for a flat monthly subscription.

Successfully matched 4000+ companies, including 400+ YC startups, with their talents who completed over 14 000 projects in the app.

Book a live demo here: https://www.awesomic.com/demo

Portfolio – https://www.awesomic.com/portfolio
Cases – https://www.awesomic.com/case-study
tags: industry:marketplace; industry:b2b; industry:recruiting; industry:design; industry:web-development; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Stacy Pavlyshyna, Founder
founders.description:
Hi, I'm Stacy (short from Anastasia). I'm Ukrainian based in San Francisco, entrepreneur from Forbes 30 under 30 list, with 2 times being on its printed covers.
My background is in marketing, my passion is in creating awesome products (and teams).
At 19, I graduated from 2 universities at once, then worked in marketing for 5 years.
With my co-founder we were matched in Tinder 9 years ago — and now we match talents with the jobs :) Awesomic is our third business. Hope you had fun reading this!

founders.name: Roman Sevast, Founder
founders.description: Roman is a self-taught hacker, builder, and hustler from Ukraine. At 13 y.o., he started launching various projects, including startups and game servers. He dropped out of college to pursue his passion. In 2020, Roman founded Awesomic (S21), which was recognized as the Fastest Growing Startup in Ukraine 2021 and named in Forbes 30u30.

## How Awesomic selects our cosmic talent
How Awesomic selects our cosmic talent
Human vetting
### Human vetting
  * **Live interview & Portfolio assessment:** Interested candidates who sign up go through a portfolio, resume, work experience, English, and communication skills vetting.
  * **Multi-step Awesomic task:** Once approved, talent has to showcase top-level communication skills, English proficiency, and technical mastery through a test task.


1
Awesomic vetting
### Awesomic vetting
  * **Technical assessment:** Our community of senior-level talent votes and provides feedback on the task delivered by the candidate. The task is blinded to minimize bias during the evaluation.
  * **Leadership vetting:** If the response from our community is positive, the talent has to meet our leaders quality threshold to ensure alignment with Awesomic’s values and community fit. 


2
Welcome to Awesomic
### Welcome to Awesomic
  * **Onboarding & Support:** Approved candidates join Awesomic as a cosmic talent. During the first weeks, they receive our support to ensure consistent quality on tasks, workflow, and client communication.


3
AI-enabled matching
### AI-enabled matching
  * **Awesomic matching:** our AI-enabled matching algorithm connects talent with client’s projects in as few as 24 hours. Only 1 in every 150+ applicants reaches this stage.
  * **Full-time project collaboration:** In the 1 to 1 plan, they are connected directly to our client for a full-time engagement.


4
Ongoing support
### Ongoing support
  * **Awesomic team:** We provide a dynamic environment with constant feedback and job performance reviews to ensure the quality of deliverables for our clients.
  * **Awesomic support:** Our clients can reach us at any time through the in-app chat with additional feedback, to rematch with other talents, or ask any question.


5

## FAQ
FAQ
### Daily updates – how does it work?
Your matched talent will update you on the progress of your tasks every business day or switch to a new one once they finish the current one.
### How many tasks can I request per month?
Every task is unique in complexity and the number of new iterations. Our plans suit every need, from one-off tasks to long-term engagements. We guarantee maximum efficiency.
### Can I add my team to my account?
Add an unlimited number of users to your Awesomic account for maximum collaboration. Please note: your team members won’t be able to request more tasks than indicated in your plan.
### How do I communicate with my hired talent(s)?
Talk with talent directly via your Awesomic account, or use our Slack integration for added convenience. You can schedule video calls via your Awesomic account. You will receive text updates every business day regardless of your plan.
### Will I work with the same people all the time?
In most cases, yes. Your tasks are matched to the same talent to maintain visual consistency and good communication and deliver the desired outcomes. We can change talent at your request; just let us know.
### How many revisions of one task are permitted?
As many as you need. Our talent(s) send you task updates every business day so you can stay on top of progress. Request changes until you are satisfied with the result.

## How Awesomic selects our cosmic talent
How Awesomic selects our cosmic talent
Human vetting
### Human vetting
  * **Live interview & Portfolio assessment:** Interested candidates who sign up go through a portfolio, resume, work experience, English, and communication skills vetting.
  * **Multi-step Awesomic task:** Once approved, talent has to showcase top-level communication skills, English proficiency, and technical mastery through a test task.


1
Awesomic vetting
### Awesomic vetting
  * **Technical assessment:** Our community of senior-level talent votes and provides feedback on the task delivered by the candidate. The task is blinded to minimize bias during the evaluation.
  * **Leadership vetting:** If the response from our community is positive, the talent has to meet our leaders quality threshold to ensure alignment with Awesomic’s values and community fit. 


2
Welcome to Awesomic
### Welcome to Awesomic
  * **Onboarding & Support:** Approved candidates join Awesomic as a cosmic talent. During the first weeks, they receive our support to ensure consistent quality on tasks, workflow, and client communication.


3
AI-enabled matching
### AI-enabled matching
  * **Awesomic matching:** our AI-enabled matching algorithm connects talent with client’s projects in as few as 24 hours. Only 1 in every 150+ applicants reaches this stage.
  * **Full-time project collaboration:** In the 1 to 1 plan, they are connected directly to our client for a full-time engagement.


4
Ongoing support
### Ongoing support
  * **Awesomic team:** We provide a dynamic environment with constant feedback and job performance reviews to ensure the quality of deliverables for our clients.
  * **Awesomic support:** Our clients can reach us at any time through the in-app chat with additional feedback, to rematch with other talents, or ask any question.


5

## FAQ
FAQ
### Daily updates – how does it work?
Your matched talent will update you on the progress of your tasks every business day or switch to a new one once they finish the current one.
### How many tasks can I request per month?
Every task is unique in complexity and the number of new iterations. Our plans suit every need, from one-off tasks to long-term engagements. We guarantee maximum efficiency.
### Can I add my team to my account?
Add an unlimited number of users to your Awesomic account for maximum collaboration. Please note: your team members won’t be able to request more tasks than indicated in your plan.
### How do I communicate with my hired talent(s)?
Talk with talent directly via your Awesomic account, or use our Slack integration for added convenience. You can schedule video calls via your Awesomic account. You will receive text updates every business day regardless of your plan.
### Will I work with the same people all the time?
In most cases, yes. Your tasks are matched to the same talent to maintain visual consistency and good communication and deliver the desired outcomes. We can change talent at your request; just let us know.
### How many revisions of one task are permitted?
As many as you need. Our talent(s) send you task updates every business day so you can stay on top of progress. Request changes until you are satisfied with the result.

## Awesomic: Your Fast-Track to Top Talent

**Mission:** Awesomic is on a straightforward mission: to connect businesses with the top 1% of vetted talent within 24 hours. Whether you're looking for designers, engineers, or no-code developers, Awesomic streamlines the process to get you the right people quickly, all for a manageable monthly subscription.

### The Company and Its Origins
Founded in 2020 as a part of Y Combinator's Summer 2021 batch, Awesomic began with a clear goal: to eliminate the hassle of finding skilled professionals. Based in San Francisco, they boast a team of around 150 dedicated employees.

### What Awesomic Offers
Awesomic's platform has successfully matched over 4,000 companies—more than 400 of which are Y Combinator startups—with the right talent. Their app has facilitated over 14,000 completed projects.
